original_text: And the Lord said unto me, Arise, get thee down quickly from hence; for thy people which thou hast brought forth out of Egypt have corrupted themselves; they are quickly turned aside out of the way which I commanded them; they have made them a molten image.
korean_text: 내게 이르시되 일어나 여기서 속히 내려가라 네가 애굽에서 인도하여 낸 네 백성이 스스로 부패하여 내가 그들에게 명령한 도를 속히 떠나 자기를 위하여 우상을 부어 만들었느니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto me
get thee down quickly from hence
for thy people which thou hast brought forth out of Egypt
out of the way which I commanded them
they have made them a molten image
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신을 위하여 주조된 우상을 만들었다
